couches.sql: select A.osm_id,A.name,A.amenity,hstore_to_json(A.tags),ST_TRANSFORM(A.way,4326) as geometry from planet_osm_line as A ,  instances  as B where B.id =  1  AND  power = 'minor_line'

select A.osm_id,A.name,A.amenity,hstore_to_json(A.tags),ST_TRANSFORM(A.way,4326) as geometry from planet_osm_point as A ,instances as B where B.id = 1 and  ( shop = 'bakery' ) union all select A.osm_id,A.name,A.amenity,hstore_to_json(A.tags),ST_Centroid(ST_TRANSFORM(A.way,4326)) as geometry from planet_osm_polygon as A ,instances as B where B.id = 1 and ( shop = 'bakery' )

select A.osm_id,A.name,A.amenity,hstore_to_json(A.tags),ST_TRANSFORM(A.way,4326) as geometry from planet_osm_point as A ,instances as B where B.id = 1 and  ( amenity = 'hospital' ) union all select A.osm_id,A.name,A.amenity,hstore_to_json(A.tags),ST_Centroid(ST_TRANSFORM(A.way,4326)) as geometry from planet_osm_polygon as A ,instances as B where B.id = 1 and ( amenity = 'hospital' )
select A.osm_id,A.name,A.amenity,hstore_to_json(A.tags), ST_TRANSFORM(A.way,4326) as geometry from planet_osm_polygon  as A , instances  as B where  B.id =  1  AND  admin_level = '9'
select A.osm_id,A.name,A.amenity,hstore_to_json(A.tags), ST_TRANSFORM(A.way,4326) as geometry from planet_osm_polygon  as A , instances  as B where  B.id =  1  AND  admin_level = '4'
